ai-patthana22.4:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.4:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of a wholesome root, for the sake of their (profitable) eyes, and so on.
ai-patthana22.4:1.1_0: (They are) not skilled in terms of the teaching, and for the sake of a cause, and for the sake of these reasons.
ai-patthana22.4:1.1_1: Not with the cause or reason, it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason for the sake of this.
ai-patthana22.4:2.1_0: not skilled in the two ways of doing profitable way.
ai-patthana22.4:2.1_1: First it is the first to take one side and two groups of one handed with a second time and third times answered to each one.
ai-patthana22.4:4.1_0: It’s not unskillful or rooted in both ways.
ai-patthana22.4:5.1_0: (They are) not skilled in profitable roots, or cause or conditioned by cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.4:5.1_4: (They are) connected with causes and reasons.
ai-patthana22.4:6.1_0: Unskillful cause or reasons not give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of unprofitable principle.
ai-patthana22.4:7.1_0: Not for the sake of skilled nor lossing,
ai-patthana22.4:7.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.4:8.1_0: Not with the cause or reason,
ai-patthana22.4:9.1_0: Not for the sake of unskillful things or not?
